name: Praveen Kumar
experience: ➢  Working on the JIOCHAT application. It’s a chatting application where a person can chat in P2P as well as in
group. Features like media upload, Status update, forward messages etc. are available.
➢  Application is based on the microservice architecture, horizontal scaling and sharded database.
Implemented Two Factor Authentication, password strengthening, captcha and account lock (prevent brute
force attack) in portal used by channel partners to broadcast messages.
Implemented rate limiting between broadcast messages to reduce the server-side load.
➢  Responsible for debugging the live issues and resolving it and also for the closure of security points.
➢  Responsible for optimizing the performance and troubleshooting production problems using heap dump,
